content: knitted hat and neck warmer for children in drops merino extra fine piece is worked in garter stitch and rib pattern me-068-bn yarn group b see the rainbow unicorn hat pattern here 1 see the rainbow unicorn mittens pattern here 2 see the rainbow the unicorn soft toy pattern here 3 **neck warmer** **size** 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 - 5/8 - 9/12 years shoulder width approx 18 20-24-26-28 cm **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio 100 100-100-150-150 g colour 17 cerise **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm **needles ** drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm for rib drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/s37-16-a-rainbow-unicorn-set-hat 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/s37-17-rainbow-unicorn-mittens 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/s37-18-rainbow-the-unicorn
